title: Your Public Lands
additional-note: This is a US government publication. No copyright applies to most of the material in it, which is by US government authors, and some issues explicitly give general permission to reprint material from them.  A few issues include reprinted or contracted material with copyright notices, such as a Far Side cartoon that is reprinted in a 1985 issue.  Copyright does still apply to that material.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
